name: Anse La Farine Jetty: Boards That Remember
description:
7 gaps, 1 post, 2 floats. A corked bottle beneath boards.

Riddle: "Where something is missing, something is hidden."

Sophisticated painterly artwork using etched-parchment technique with Seychellois cultural motifs. Part of "The Siren's Map of Praslin" cipher series.

attributes.value: VII - The Siren's Map of Praslin

advanced_specs.render_prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 7 gaps, 1 post, 2 floats. A corked bottle beneath boards.. weathered_jetty_hidden_secrets with weathered_wood_rope_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_lagoon_midground_jetty_foreground_bottle. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: traditional_jetty_construction, fishing_gear. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
advanced_specs.negative_prompt: flat shapes, primitive graphics, basic fills, simple geometry, vector primitives, plain colors, childlike, cartoon, modern technology, photoreal, neon, low detail

puzzle_data.scene: 7 gaps, 1 post, 2 floats. A corked bottle beneath boards.
puzzle_data.riddle: Where something is missing, something is hidden.
